trans-unit.source: Signing in to the mobile app using notification with Azure Multi-Factor Authentication
trans-unit.target: Signing in to the mobile app using notification with Azure Multi-Factor Authentication

trans-unit.source: This page will describe how a user can signin using mobile app notification with Azure MFA.
trans-unit.target: This page will describe how a user can signin using mobile app notification with Azure MFA.

trans-unit.source: Signing in to the mobile app using notification with Azure Multi-Factor Authentication
trans-unit.target: Signing in to the mobile app using notification with Azure Multi-Factor Authentication

trans-unit.source: The following information will describe the experience of using multi-factor authentication with your mobile app when you are sent a notification.
trans-unit.target: The following information will describe the experience of using multi-factor authentication with your mobile app when you are sent a notification.

trans-unit.source: To sign in with a notification sent to your mobile app
trans-unit.target: To sign in with a notification sent to your mobile app

trans-unit.source: Sign in to an application or service such as Office 365 using your user name and password.
trans-unit.target: Sign in to an application or service such as Office 365 using your user name and password.

trans-unit.source: Answer the phone and hit the verify key.
trans-unit.target: Answer the phone and hit the verify key.

trans-unit.source: You should now be signed in.
trans-unit.target: You should now be signed in.
